subject: p12185775
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was compared to prior study obtained on, at 10:52 pm. In addition to previously discussed new right lower lobe opacity most likely representing atelectasis, there is interval development of pulmonary edema, moderate-to-severe, associated with bilateral pleural effusions. Heart size and mediastinum are unchanged.
